page.title: 03CLUBS IN DANBURY
page.content: Danbury is a wonderful place.It has a wide variety of clubs which cater for Danburys population.They range from Church based clubs to sports,here are a few examples Brownies,Girl guides, Tennis,Allrounders,Golf,Badminton, Football,Hockey,Spinning,Squash Etc. The most popular club for children is Brownies,the second is cubs and the third is Football.For adults the most popular is Golf,the second is Tennis and the third is Badminton and bowling.The least popular for children is Bowling,Hockey,Twins,Youth,Slimmers ,Lace,Spinning and Squash.The least popular for Adults is Bell ringing, ,Allrounders,Choir,Football,Hockey, Twins and the Youth club.16% of the Adults go to Tennis.22% go to Golf and 9% go to a Music club.34% of the children go to Brownies.27% go to Cubs and 15% go to Football.The sample=200.
